page.title: 06Macclesfield Forest Ecology
page.content:
ECOLOGY
{Climate}- The area is cold, windy and open to the elements. Severe snow in the winter makes travelling outside the area very difficult. People living here have to be of a special quality due to the adverse living conditions. The summer although short can be pleasant.
{Problems}- Some visitors cause problems by pilfering stones from the walls allowing sheep to escape, dumping rubbish and stealing sheep. One farmer estimated that 12 lambs and two sheep are stolen each year. Deer, foxes, hares and rabbits are a problem to both the farmer and the forester and have to be culled.
